items.name: Crew kneck whole garment sweater - Black
items.detail: Knitted from soft, natural, pure wool this cable knit aran has a crew neck with ribbed cuffs and hem in Cream. By mixing traditional Guernsey patterns with modern equipment we can produce a chunky textured sweater that has also been knitted to shape for a quality finish. Each piece is made to the exact required shape and is sewn together with traditional Guernsey skills.
